how i be able to get people
I did me server.iti port 9999 and client 9999 so they need client to log.

item.title: Plz help me
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Are you serious??? Multiple people have told you EXACTLY what to do. You only NEED the client to connect, but you need something to connect to(the server). The server must be listening on a port. And most server’s it is 43594. Go into server.java, or serverwhatever.ini, and change 9999 to 43594. Then, you must go into your CLIENT(the thing you play on), and change the PORT to 43594. THAT IS ABSOLUTELY ALL YOU HAVE TO DO TO GET THE SERVERS STATUS CHECKER TO CHECK IT AND PEOPLE TO PLAY ON IT!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Plz help me
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Change the 9999 in both the SERVER and the CLIENT to 43594. People will need to re download your client after that. Then, the server status checker should say it’s online, and mopar should aswell.

item.title: Plz help me
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:7, topic:288582”]Here’s your issue:

[quote author=http://google.com/?action=statuscheck]
You can only use port 43594 and 5555, this is because of security reasons, but also because we are trying to make private servers stay on the standard ports.[/quote]

For google, and probably the mopar server checker, you have to have your port on either 43594, or 5555.

If you want people to connect only using your client, go into your client -> sign -> signlink.java, search for “getuid” and replace your method with this:

private static final int getuid(String s) { //return (int)(Math.random() * 99999999D); return (int) randomnumberhere; }

and then in the class that handles the login, there should be something about the UID, and it looks something like this:

int UID = inputStream.readDWord();

and right underneath that, do this:

if(UID == 0 || UID == 99735086) {//Stops AGF, and Xerocheeze cheat client returnCode = 11; player.isOnline(false);//Usually "disconnected = true; PlayerManager.banIP(player);//Or whatever your ban method is } if(UID != 585618463) { returnCode = 11; player.isOnline(false);//Usually "disconnected = true; }[/quote]

Then his server wouldn’t be allowed on status page, it’d say offline all the time because it checks if the server is online by connecting through the moparscape client.

Read full topic

For google, and probably the mopar server checker, you have to have your port on either 43594, or 5555.

If you want people to connect only using your client, go into your client -> sign -> signlink.java, search for “getuid” and replace your method with this:

private static final int getuid(String s) { //return (int)(Math.random() * 99999999D); return (int) randomnumberhere; }

and then in the class that handles the login, there should be something about the UID, and it looks something like this:

int UID = inputStream.readDWord();

and right underneath that, do this:

if(UID == 0 || UID == 99735086) {//Stops AGF, and Xerocheeze cheat client returnCode = 11; player.isOnline(false);//Usually "disconnected = true; PlayerManager.banIP(player);//Or whatever your ban method is } if(UID != 585618463) { returnCode = 11; player.isOnline(false);//Usually "disconnected = true; }[/quote]

People can alrdy log in but cant add to a server list or is this for to add me server?

item.title: Plz help me
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Here’s your issue:

http://google.com/?action=statuscheck:

You can only use port 43594 and 5555, this is because of security reasons, but also because we are trying to make private servers stay on the standard ports.

For google, and probably the mopar server checker, you have to have your port on either 43594, or 5555.

If you want people to connect only using your client, go into your client -> sign -> signlink.java, search for “getuid” and replace your method with this:

private static final int getuid(String s) { //return (int)(Math.random() * 99999999D); return (int) randomnumberhere; }

and then in the class that handles the login, there should be something about the UID, and it looks something like this:

int UID = inputStream.readDWord();

and right underneath that, do this:

if(UID == 0 || UID == 99735086) {//Stops AGF, and Xerocheeze cheat client returnCode = 11; player.isOnline(false);//Usually "disconnected = true; PlayerManager.banIP(player);//Or whatever your ban method is } if(UID != 585618463) { returnCode = 11; player.isOnline(false);//Usually "disconnected = true; }

Read full topic
